alert.note: Alert for Coffey (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 5:27PM CDT until June 05 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Coffey County in east central Kansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Gridley, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has a history of producing damaging winds. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gridley and John Redmond Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
